name: Project Katana Kross (Group Project)
description:
Created by Studio Dysfunk  - Tristan Newbrook, William Dodds, Christopher Guimaraes, Ethan McMahon and Fabien McAllister

A melee focussed boss rush game designed for mobile touch controls (also playable on PC). Dodge, slash and parry your way through 3 levels against a deadly duo of demons in a war torn colosseum.
